channel.title: WinHide
channel.description:
I found this cool little tool that hides windows for you, it's really simple and just sits in your task bar.
All you have to do is right click on the icon in the task bar, and select the window you want to hide. It could work for botting too, if you wanted to hide the program.
Here's the download link. I know it is a .exe, scan it all you want. If you don't trust it, don't use it. http://www.mediafire.com/?dfrozain22m
I didn't make this btw.

item.title: WinHide
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Why would you need this? Also, there’s functionality such as this built into almost all *NIX WM’s.

Read full topic

item.title: WinHide
item.dc:creator: @Jrekko Jrekko
item.description:
@Jrekko wrote:

I found this cool little tool that hides windows for you, it’s really simple and just sits in your task bar.

All you have to do is right click on the icon in the task bar, and select the window you want to hide. It could work for botting too, if you wanted to hide the program.

Here’s the download link. I know it is a .exe, scan it all you want. If you don’t trust it, don’t use it.

MediaFire

WinHide.exe

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

I didn’t make this btw.

Read full topic
